JOIN_REQUEST.PacketId: A Valid packet type, in this case "JOIN_REQUEST"

HEARTBEAT.PacketId: A Valid packet type, in this case "HEARTBEAT"

LEFT_SESSION.PacketId: A Valid packet type, in this case "LEFT_SESSION"

CLIENT_UPDATE.PacketId: A Valid packet type, in this case "CLIENT_UPDATE"

VOTE_TO_START_SESSION.PacketId: A Valid packet type, in this case "VOTE_TO_START_SESSION"

REMOVE_VOTE_TO_START_SESSION.PacketId: A Valid packet type, in this case "REMOVE_VOTE_TO_START_SESSION"

PLAYER_SHIP_CHANGE ( WIP ).PacketId: A Valid packet type, in this case "REMOVE_VOTE_TO_START_SESSION"

NOT_CONNECTED.PacketId: A Valid packet type, in this case "NOT_CONNECTED"

JOIN_ACCEPTED.PacketId: A Valid packet type, in this case "JOIN_ACCEPTED"
JOIN_ACCEPTED.AckId: Unique ack id that the client needs to answer back
JOIN_ACCEPTED.PlayerReady: Have the player voted to start the game session

LOST_CLIENT.PacketId: A Valid packet type, in this case "LOST_CLIENT"
LOST_CLIENT.PlayerId: Id of the player that was lost

HEARTBEAT_REQUEST.PacketId: A Valid packet type, in this case "HEARTBEAT_REQUEST"

UPDATED_CLIENT.PacketId: A Valid packet type, in this case "UPDATED_CLIENT"
UPDATED_CLIENT.PlayerXPos: The updated x position of the player
UPDATED_CLIENT.PlayerYPos: The updated y position of the player
UPDATED_CLIENT.Throttling: If the player is holding the throttle(gas)
UPDATED_CLIENT.PlayerRotation: The start rotation of the player

DECLINED_JOIN_REQUEST.PacketId: A Valid packet type, in this case "DECLINED_JOIN_REQUEST"

NEW_PLAYER_JOINED.PacketId: A Valid packet type, in this case "NEW_PLAYER_JOINED"
NEW_PLAYER_JOINED.AckId: Unique ack id that the client needs to answer back
NEW_PLAYER_JOINED.PlayerReady: Have the player voted to start the game session
NEW_PLAYER_JOINED.PlayerName: Name of the new player (Not supported)

PLAYER_VOTE_TO_START.PacketId: A Valid packet type, in this case "PLAYER_VOTE_TO_START"
PLAYER_VOTE_TO_START.PlayerId: Id of the player that voted to start
PLAYER_VOTE_TO_START.AckId: Unique ack id that the client needs to answer back

PLAYER_REMOVE_VOTE_TO_START.PacketId: A Valid packet type, in this case "PLAYER_REMOVE_VOTE_TO_START"
PLAYER_REMOVE_VOTE_TO_START.PlayerId: Id of the player that removed their vote
PLAYER_REMOVE_VOTE_TO_START.AckId: Unique ack id that the client needs to answer back

STARTING_GAME.PacketId: A Valid packet type, in this case "STARTING_GAME"
STARTING_GAME.AckId: Unique ack id that the client needs to answer back

PLAYER_SHIP_CHANGE ( WIP ).PacketId: A Valid packet type, in this case "PLAYER_SHIP_CHANGE"
PLAYER_SHIP_CHANGE ( WIP ).AckId: Unique ack id that the client needs to answer back
